<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internalizepass">InternalizePass</a></>}>
A pass that internalizes all functions and variables other than those that must be preserved according to <code>MustPreserveGV</code>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internalizepass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass loops over all of the functions and variables in the input module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the function or variable does not need to be preserved according to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// client supplied callback, it is marked as internal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This transformation would not be legal in a regular compilation, but it gets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extra information from the linker about what is safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example: Internalizing a function with external linkage. Only if we are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// told it is only used from within this module, it is safe to do it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
